lore: Named for the chilling roars it lets out as it lunges, the Veliceoraptor is pure deadly speed. It hunts in packs and leaves no tracksâ€”except for the ice that forms under its feet, hard to spot in its natural habitat. Once thought a northern legend, blue bones found in glaciers tell a different story. Some time ago, scientists brought them back to life, but a security failure sent many to the Frostbitten Caverns, where they've thrived since.
menagerieDialog: (It's lounging peacefully, occasionally snorting small puffs of elemental energy.)
RAWR! Time to show these puny creatures what real power looks like!
The wisdom of the ancients and the power of the elements are mine to command. What would you like to know?
My hide is infused with primal magic. Nothing can harm me!
(It's stomping around, leaving trails of elemental energy in its wake.)
name: Veliceoraptor
